setWealth(int) - Method in class blackjackplayground.CoinPurse
Sets the current wealth in the CoinPurse to given amount if given less than 10, keeps the current amount
shuffle() - Method in class blackjackplayground.Deck
Uses the card storage to shuffle a new 52 card deck of playing cards.
split() - Method in class blackjackplayground.Hand
Creates a new hand using one card from the orginal hand.
splitButton - Variable in class blackjackplayground.GameUI
 
splitPressed() - Method in class blackjackplayground.Dealer
Method that is called if the player decides to split his hand Calls split() on the hand, then deals one more card to each hand, enables the split hand as the hand played and checks if it was blackjack before updating UI.
stateChanged(ChangeEvent) - Method in class blackjackplayground.CoinPurse
 
stayButton - Variable in class blackjackplayground.GameUI
 
stayPressed() - Method in class blackjackplayground.Dealer
Method that is called after player decides he wants to stay with his current hand.

Enumerator representing the Suits of the basic playing cards used in BlackJack
